attributes.action: To remove all MPs who have claimed large expenses of tax payers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last week we have seen huge amounts of money being claimed by Member's of Parliment.
 We teach our children to be honest and we hear of people that claim benifts there not entitled to yet these people just think a quick apology is enough. They should not be our members of parliment after doing this and should be removed from office.
They are not honest people and if the people claimed money there not entitled to we would not get away with just saying sorry. We do not want people representing us that are not honest people.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
